summary: Set against the backdrop of a decaying Midwestern town, a murder becomes the focal point of three people who work in a doll factory.
cast: Debbie Doebereiner|Omar Cowan|Dustin James Ashley|Phyllis Workman|Laurie L. Wee|Daniel R. Christian|Misty Wilkins|Madison Wilkins|K. Smith|Decker Moody|Thomas R. Davis|Ross Clegg|Scott Smeeks|M. Stephen Deem|Leonora K. Hornbeck|Katherine Beaumier|Joyce Brookhart|David Hubbard
title: Bubble
